channel.title: AI & Telecom News Digest
channel.description: Daily AI & Telecom insights curated by n8n + Perplexity

item.title: Untitled
item.description:
Telecom companies must adopt generative AI to reduce costs, drive growth, improve security, and transform into tech-focused firms offering AI-driven services.

The report reveals that by 2025, half of telecom companies have adopted generative AI, marking significant integration of AI technologies in the industry.

item.description:
